data.title: Things to Do in Connecticut, July 4 to 11, 2015
data.meta_description: A guide to cultural and recreational events in Connecticut.
data.text:
A guide to cultural and recreational events in Connecticut. Items for the calendar should be sent at least three weeks in advance to ctcal@nytimes.com.

Comedy

COLLINSVILLE Bridge Street Live Pete Lee. July 10 at 8 p.m. $15 and $25. Bridge Street Live, 41 Bridge Street. 860-693-9762; 41bridgestreet.com.

HARTFORD Bushnell Center for the Performing Arts “A Trip to Unicorn Island,” Lilly Singh. July 10 at 5:30 p.m. $29.50 to $55. Bushnell Center for the Performing Arts, 166 Capitol Avenue. 860-987-5900; bushnell.org.
